name: caribou-project
description: cd into caribou-project and run in the terminal:

scripts.install:both: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.stop:server: npm run stop --prefix server && npm run deleteAll:processes --prefix server
scripts.start:both: npm run start:serverProd & npm run start:client
scripts.start:bothDev: npm run start:serverDev & npm run start:client

author: Giovanni Reid
